sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react"; import "./IlkOnbir.css"; import Altay from './PlayersPics/altay-fb1.jpeg'; import Serdar from './PlayersPics/SerdarAziz.jpeg'; import Simon from './PlayersPics/Simon Falette.jpg'; import Nabil from './PlayersPics/Nabil Dirar.jpeg'; import Hasan from './PlayersPics/Hasan Ali Kaldirim.jpeg'; import Emre from './PlayersPics/Emre.jpeg'; import Luiz from './PlayersPics/Luis Gustavo.jpeg'; import Ozan from './PlayersPics/Ozan Tufan.jpeg'; import Deniz from './PlayersPics/Deniz türüç.jpeg'; import Gary from './PlayersPics/Gary.jpeg'; import Tolga from './PlayersPics/Tolga.jpeg'; import Ferdi from './PlayersPics/Ferdi.jpeg'; import Mevlut from './PlayersPics/Mevlüt.jpeg'; import Vedat from './PlayersPics/Vedat.jpeg'; export default class IlkOnbir extends Component { state = { info : false, btn: true, players: [{ id: 1, name: 'Altay Bayindir', age: '21', mevki: 'Kaleci', source: {Altay} }, { id: 2, name: 'Serdar Aziz', age: '29', mevki: 'Stoper', source: {Serdar} }, ] } showInfo = (id) => { this.setState({info: !this.state.info, btn: !this.state.btn}) } render () { const hideInfo = this.state.info const pl = this.state.players.map((player) => { return (
{hideInfo === true ?

{player.name}

{player.age}

{player.mevki}

: "" }
) }) return (
{pl} {/*

{this.state.btn === true ? "SHOW" : "HIDE"} INFO

{hideInfo === true ?

Altay Bayindir

Age : 21

Mevki : Kaleci

: "" }

{this.state.btn === true ? "SHOW" : "HIDE"} INFO

{hideInfo === true ?

Serdar Aziz

Age : 28

Mevki : Stoper

: "" }
*/} {/*
*/} {/*
*/} {/*

Simon Falette

Age : 23

Mevki : Stoper

Nabil Dirar

Age : 33

Mevki : Sag Bek

Hasan Ali Kaldirim

Age : 31

Mevki : Sol Bek

Emre Belözoglu

Age : 37

Mevki : Orta Saha

Luiz Gustavo

Age : 32

Mevki : Orta Saha

Ozan Tufan

Age : 25

Mevki : Orta Saha

Deniz Türüç

Age : 27

Mevki : Kanat

Gary Rodriguez

Age : 28

Ferdi Kadioglu

Vedat Muriqi

Age : 25

Mevki : Forvet

*/}
); } }
